data.event: Sirka is a colliery township in South Karanpura Coalfield located at 23°38′37″N 85°26′6″E. As per 2011 Census of India Sirka had a population of 19,871.

event.title: 2011 Census of India, Ramgarh Urban Agglomeration had a total population of 132,441, of which males were 70,871 and females

data.event: As per 2011 Census of India, Ramgarh Urban Agglomeration had a total population of 132,441, of which males were 70,871 and females 61,562.Ramgarh Urban Agglomeration is composed of Ramgarh Cantonment (Cantonment Board), Sirka (Census Town), Marar (CT) and Barkakana (CT).
